description:
Adds a new named dimension to the data cube.

Afterwards, the dimension can be referred to with the specified `name`. If a dimension with the specified name exists, the process fails with a `DimensionExists` exception. The dimension label of the dimension is set to the specified `label`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A data cube to add the dimension to.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of dimension, defaults to `other`.

returns.description: The data cube with a newly added dimension. The new dimension has exactly one dimension label. All other dimensions remain unchanged.

DimensionExists.message: A dimension with the specified name already exists.
